name: Topline Pro
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Boston, MA, USA
long_description: Topline Pro (formerly ProPhone) is a Generative AI platform enabling home service businesses to be easily discovered, trusted and booked, directly. The AI-driven interface rapidly and affordably creates a custom, SEO-optimized website along with a application to help sync content to and from local listings, put social media communications on autopilot and enable the business owner to easily get paid online.
one_liner: Generative AI powered Shopify for home service professionals
